resources.string: Please write at least two sentences
It looks like you haven\'t saved any story yet !
At least two players are necessary !
Every player must have a name !
The last sentence cannot be empty !

Hello, I am Yuzu ! I will be your guide through this game. I will show you how to play, an introduce you to the fuctionalities of this app ! If you ever want to see these instructions again, you\'ll find me in the options !

Let\'s start at the beginning ! Yuzu is a multiplayer game, so every player has to enter his name to know when his turn comes ! When every player has a name, you can click on the arrow at the bottom of the screen to start the game !

This is the main screen of the game! At the top, you can see which player must play, under this, you can see the last sentence of the player before, this is the only thing you know about the story, and you need to continue the story by writing what comes after this sentence, you can write as many sentences as you want with the plus button. You can finish your turn by pressing the arrow, and when you think the story is long enough, click \"Finish\"
Here you can see the full story you just wrote, you can, with the button at the botton, save the story to read it again later, send it to your friends, or return to the game\'s main screen

We are a team of two french students. We wanted to create a game inspired by the \"Cadavre exquis\" to have something to do withs our friends or family. So I programmed the game, a version that worked, but was ugly. So I asked Sadia, who\'s a better artist than I am, to take care of the game\'s graphics, and this is what we created !

If you would like to write your own application for android, I recommend you the book \"Android development for gifted primates\" by Antonis Tsagaris, it is easy to follow and this is what I used to learn and create this game ! You can buy it Here.
Are you sure you want to delete every story you saved ? You can delete them individually from the \"Saves\" page

This application uses Answers by Fabric to collect anonymous usage data ans crash reports to help us improve the game. Data like the phone model and OS version are collected. We are also using Google Admob to show you advertisements which help us fund the game.

We want to respect your privacy, this is why we allow you to prevent the app from collecting such data and showing you tailored ads.

You can at any time deactivate or reactivate these settings from the options menu.
